task.title: Changing the Target of Local Related Link

taskbody.context: To change the target of a local related link, do the following:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in the related link.
Call up the Change Local Related Link Dialog.

info.p: To call up the Change Local Related Link Dialog, choose DITA Insert External Related Link or click the Insert External Related Link button on the toolbar.

step.cmd: Change the target of the local related link.

info.p: In the Change Local Related Link Dialog, select the target from the Targets list.

step.cmd: Click the Change button to change the related link.
